text: Bonus example set pro vos Abraham those eum. They dictus to their people Nos disown vos idols vos worship DEUS. Nos denounce vos vos vide nihil ex nos animosity hatred vos believe in DEUS ALONE mistake committed Abraham when he dictus to his patris ego pray tuus forgiveness ego non possess power protect vos ex DEUS. Noster Dominus nos trust in Vos submit Vos; Vos est ultimus destiny
